(It's aye, not ai.  Ai= artificial intelligence.  It's aye people.  Oh well.  
I don't think a temp. council is needed, I don't think moderation of the dude 
is needed, I think some one e-mailing him and explaining things to him would 
be best.  He's probably from a different type of RPG or he's completely new.

Best thing would to not yell at him or call him a moder or stupid but to just 
explain the situation, and send him off to the rules section of the website)

--part1_a2.16cf4410.2882141d_boundary
